languages.text: Многие вещества содержат в себе удивительные силы. Магосы Алхемис умеют пробуждать их, и плоды их трудов востребованы всеми — и умелыми ремесленниками, и мудрыми целителями, и суровыми чистильщиками скверны.

traits.locale_text: Химикаты требуются почти в любом производстве. Добывать их можно как из минералов, так и из растений.

languages.text: Numerous substances contain remarkable powers. Magi Alchemys know how to awaken such powers, and the fruits of this labour are highly sought after by skilled artisans, wise healers, and harsh purgers of corruption.
languages.original_text: Многие вещества содержат в себе удивительные силы. Магосы Алхемис умеют пробуждать их, и плоды их трудов востребованы всеми — и умелыми ремесленниками, и мудрыми целителями, и суровыми чистильщиками скверны.

traits.locale_text: Numerous substances contain remarkable powers. Magi Alchemys know how to awaken such powers, and the fruits of this labour are highly sought after by skilled artisans, wise healers, and harsh purgers of corruption.
These substances are used in almost all industries. They can be derived from either minerals or plants.

Numerous substances contain remarkable powers. Magi Alchemys know how to awaken such powers, and the fruits of this labour are highly sought after by skilled artisans, wise healers, and harsh purgers of corruption.
Chemicals are used in almost all industries. They can be derived from either minerals or plants.
Chemicals are used in almost all industries. They can be derived from either minerals or plants.

Numerous substances contain remarkable powers. Magi Alchemys know how to awaken such powers, and the fruits of this labour are highly sought after by skilled artisans, wise healers, and harsh purgers of corruption.

Numerous substances contain remarkable powers. Magi Alchemys know how to awaken such powers, and the fruits of this labour are highly sought after by skilled artisans, wise healers, and harsh purgers of corruption.

languages.text: 很多物质都蕴含着非凡的力量，而炼金贤者知道如何唤醒这种力量。通过这种方式制造出的产物，在熟练的工匠师、技艺精湛的治疗师，以及渴望净化腐化的虔信者之间非常受欢迎。
languages.original_text: Numerous substances contain remarkable powers. Magi Alchemys know how to awaken such powers, and the fruits of this labour are highly sought after by skilled artisans, wise healers, and harsh purgers of corruption.

traits.locale_text: 很多物质都蕴含着非凡的力量，而炼金贤者知道如何唤醒这种力量。通过这种方式制造出的产物，在熟练的工匠师、技艺精湛的治疗师，以及渴望净化腐化的虔信者之间非常受欢迎。

languages.text: Existen diversas sustancias con poderes extraordinarios. Los magos alchemys saben cómo despertarlos, y los frutos de su trabajo son muy valiosos para los maestros artesanos, los curanderos más sabios y los poderosos purgadores de la corrupción.
languages.original_text: Numerous substances contain remarkable powers. Magi Alchemys know how to awaken such powers, and the fruits of this labour are highly sought after by skilled artisans, wise healers, and harsh purgers of corruption.

traits.locale_text: Existen diversas sustancias con poderes extraordinarios. Los magos alchemys saben cómo despertarlos, y los frutos de su trabajo son muy valiosos para los maestros artesanos, los curanderos más sabios y los poderosos purgadores de la corrupción.

languages.text: 多くの物質には驚くべき力が秘められている。錬金魔術団はそうした力を呼び覚ます方法を知っており、熟練した職工や聡明な癒し手、腐敗を粛正する厳格な者たちからその成果を強く求められている。
languages.original_text: Numerous substances contain remarkable powers. Magi Alchemys know how to awaken such powers, and the fruits of this labour are highly sought after by skilled artisans, wise healers, and harsh purgers of corruption.

traits.locale_text: 多くの物質には驚くべき力が秘められている。錬金魔術団はそうした力を呼び覚ます方法を知っており、熟練した職工や聡明な癒し手、腐敗を粛正する厳格な者たちからその成果を強く求められている。

languages.text: Zahlreiche Substanzen enthalten bemerkenswerte Kräfte. Magi Alchemys wissen, wie man solche Kräfte wecken kann, und die Früchte dieser Arbeit sind sehr begehrt bei fähigen Handwerkern, weisen Heilern und gnadenlosen Bekämpfern der Korruption.
languages.original_text: Numerous substances contain remarkable powers. Magi Alchemys know how to awaken such powers, and the fruits of this labour are highly sought after by skilled artisans, wise healers, and harsh purgers of corruption.

traits.locale_text: Zahlreiche Substanzen enthalten bemerkenswerte Kräfte. Magi Alchemys wissen, wie man solche Kräfte wecken kann, und die Früchte dieser Arbeit sind sehr begehrt bei fähigen Handwerkern, weisen Heilern und gnadenlosen Bekämpfern der Korruption.

languages.text: De nombreuses substances possèdent des qualités remarquables. Les magos Alchemys savent éveiller de tels pouvoirs et le fruit de leur travail est très recherché parmi les artisans les plus doués, les guérisseurs les plus sages et les purificateurs de corruption les plus zélés.
languages.original_text: Numerous substances contain remarkable powers. Magi Alchemys know how to awaken such powers, and the fruits of this labour are highly sought after by skilled artisans, wise healers, and harsh purgers of corruption.

traits.locale_text: De nombreuses substances possèdent des qualités remarquables. Les magos Alchemys savent éveiller de tels pouvoirs et le fruit de leur travail est très recherché parmi les artisans les plus doués, les guérisseurs les plus sages et les purificateurs de corruption les plus zélés.

languages.text: Olağanüstü güçler barındıran çok sayıda madde. Magos Alşimisler, bu güçleri nasıl uyandıracaklarını bilirler ve bu emeğin meyveleri de yetenekli zanaatkârlardan, bilge şifacılardan ve yozluğun kökünü kurutmaya ant içmişlerden büyük rağbet görür.
languages.original_text: Numerous substances contain remarkable powers. Magi Alchemys know how to awaken such powers, and the fruits of this labour are highly sought after by skilled artisans, wise healers, and harsh purgers of corruption.
